cause.description:
Noonan syndrome is a relatively common genetic birth defect that affects roughly 1 in 2500 children born in the United States. Symptoms include heart defects, problems with the gastrointestinal system, and skeletal deformities.
The Noonan Syndrome Support Group is a community dedicated to providing information and support for people who are affected by Noonan syndrome.
1. Website - noonansyndrome.org has a wealth of information on Noonan Syndrome.
2. Mailing list - An email list service which offers educational and emotional support.
3. Resources - Names of specialists who have worked with TNSSG are available upon request.
4. Newsletter - The Noonan Connection is published on a quarterly basis.
5. Public Awareness - TNSSG helps fight misconceptions about Noonan syndrome.
cause.mission: We provide information and support to people whose lives are affected by Noonan's syndrome.
cause.name: Noonan Syndrome Support Group
